item.title: Downloads
item.author: yoshiyuki.inoue_at_riken.jp (Yoshiyuki Inoue)
item.description: Data from our papers Please read each paper for details. To download numerical data, please click the link right next to the “Data File:". If you have any queries and/or need other data, please contact me freely. Extragalactic Background Light model: (Inoue et al. 2013) Model data of EBL intensity (z=0), Proper photon density, and Gamma-ray Opacity Data File: EBL_data_yinoue.tar.gz A bound on primordial black holes density: (Inoue & Kusenko 2017) The upper bound on the PBH mass fraction based on luminosity function of XRBs Data File: Limit_Omega_PBH_IK17.

item.title: Profile
item.author: yoshiyuki.inoue_at_riken.jp (Yoshiyuki Inoue)
item.description: Name: Yoshiyuki Inoue Email: yoshiyuki.inoue_at_riken.jp Phone: +81-48-467-9608 Date of Birth: February 1st, 1985 Nationality: Japan Address: iTHEMS, RIKEN, 2-1 Hirosawa, Wako, Saitama 351-0198, JAPAN Projects: CTA (2010-), Fermi (2012-), Hitomi (2012-), NuSTAR (2012-2014), MAGIC (2019-), GRAMS (2019-) Research Interests High Energy Astrophysics, Supermassive Black Holes, Active Galactic Nuclei, Relativistic Jets, Cosmic Background Radiation Education Ph.D. (Science), Department of Astronomy, Kyoto University, March, 2012 M.S. (Scinence), Department of Astronomy, Kyoto University, March, 2009 B.

item.title: Research
item.author: yoshiyuki.inoue_at_riken.jp (Yoshiyuki Inoue)
item.description: Research Style. I have been working on both theoretical and observational astrophysics. My research attitude is to try anything that interests me 1. Main Research Subjects. Black holes As for astrophysical phenomena, I like black holes. Research topics of black hole objects are diverse such as primordial black holes, supermassive black holes, accretion disks, and jet. I am interested in all those kinds of astrophysical phenomena related to black holes.
